constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. BLUNT ROCHESTER:
H.R. 2126.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1621]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Housing Supply and Affordability Act
